comment.body:
Hi !! Very good all
I think I found a small mistake.
I modify my content.json with your text :
"bitmsg/.*@zeroid.bit": { "max_size": 15000 },
"bitmsg/.*@zeroverse.bit": { "max_size": 15000 }
},
"permissions": {
"bad@zeroid.bit": false,
"nofish@zeroid.bit": { "max_size": 100000 },
"erkan@zeroverse.bit": { "max_size": 100000 },   //// I use this comma :blog bug. When I delete it, all is work.
Must I delete it ?
